category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_post_export_script
preference.preference_description: Automatically compresses export data using the standard_post_export_script.pl script when a user performs a local export operation using any of the following methods:Object Export commanditem_export utilityCustomized ITK program that exports objects via OBJIO functionsIf this preference is not defined, no compression occurs.This script does not apply during remote export, which employs a different compression/decompression method. Valid Values: Complete path name of script. If only the script name is given, the script is assumed to be stored in the TC_BIN directory.
